job_tasks.phrase: Na een succesvolle afronding heb jij als AI Engineer de kennis en kunde om AI-systemen te ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en onderhouden.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core software engineering tasks of designing, developing, and maintaining AI systems, which aligns with the definition of building and deploying software applications.
The explicit mention of 'MLOps' falls directly under the category of building and managing infrastructure and pipelines for ML/GenAI systems.
DevOps and Version Control (Git) are key components of managing and maintaining software systems, aligning with the MLOps definition.
CI/CD practices, along with tools like Docker and Kubernetes, are fundamental to the operations and deployment of software, fitting the MLOps category.

job_tasks.phrase: Specialisatie in: Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Generative AI (LLM)
job_tasks.justification: Specializing in Deep Learning, Computer Vision, and Generative AI (LLM) directly relates to the core process of creating, training, or adapting machine learning models.

While 'AI Ethics & Security' could be seen as a specialization, in the context of the overall job description which focuses on developing and maintaining AI systems for projects, it implies understanding the business context and strategic considerations of deploying AI responsibly. It's a skill that informs how AI is applied to business problems.

soft_skills.phrase: wil je je graag verder ontwikkelen? Dan bieden wij jou de unieke kans om in een Fast Track van zes weken uit te groeien tot een expert op het gebied van Artificial Intelligence
Na een succesvolle afronding heb jij als AI Engineer de kennis en kunde om AI-systemen te ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en onderhouden. Je gaat direct aan de slag op een project e...

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a fast-track program to become an AI Engineer with a specialization in Generative AI (LLM), Deep Learning, and Computer Vision. It explicitly mentions core software engineering tasks like designing, developing, and maintaining AI systems, alongside MLOps, DevOps, and CI/CD. The inclusion of Generative AI as a specialization, combined with the software engineering and MLOps aspects, points towards a role that balances both traditional engineering practices and AI specialization, with a clear emphasis on modern AI techniques like LLMs.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines the desired skills and specializations, including both software engineering practices (MLOps, DevOps, CI/CD) and AI model development (Deep Learning, Generative AI). The 'Fast Track' program description reinforces the focus on developing expertise in these areas. The only slight ambiguity is the breadth of specializations mentioned (Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Generative AI), but the overall framing points towards a role that integrates these, with a specific mention of Generative AI (LLM).
